name: part_002
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】さくらみこ1st Live ＂flower fantasista!＂【#咲き誇るみこち】 [mVmWmkHltak]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: A montage of fan messages and illustrations for Sakura Miko's 1st Live 'flower fantasista!'.
Pre-concert waiting screen with event logo and character illustration.
Audience attention screen detailing concert rules and precautions.
Showcase of exclusive made-to-order concert merchandise (Goods).
Extended montage continuing the display of fan messages and celebratory art.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください。
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
